column5: Hey my name's Steve, a avid fisherman just wanted to say hello share with you my first Musky I caught on Sturgeon Lake. I caught this Musky trolling with some friends out in 16ft of water in the last weekend in October. Was the only fish caught that afternoon and was it ever a strong fighter, jumping twice out of the water for me, had to hand land it.  Was a blast and I can say I'm hooked on Musky for next year.     Great to be apart of the community here  Peace, Soupie
welcome aboard!! nice lookin 'ski bud! congrats!
Awesome job. Looks like a nice fish. ahhh the joys of muskie fishing.
Ah yes the first muskie! Congrats on the SKI! I caught my frist one this year and been hooked since! Keep it up they just keep getting bigger I here!
congrats and welcome to OFC
Welcome to OFC Steve Congratulations on your first ski     Beauty Looking forward to reading your future reports Thanks for sharing Leechman
Atta boy Steve, looks like a decent sized one too.
Congrates on the musky Steve, awesome fish!    I sometimes fish on Buckhorn and definitely plan on going for those baby's next year. They look like a ton of fun to catch!  Welcome to OFC!
nice for the first!
Not a bad way to start off .. I guess you're hooked now.
Glad you joined up Steve. Definitely hittin up some fish this winter for sure.  Congrads again, MTBF
All it takes is one.... now you're addicted too.  Welcome to the club... and to OFC.
HA HA.... Your Bugged up now!  Nice fish and welcome aboard!
Welcome aboard Steve congrats on the first and sorry to here you piked up the musky Flu it's alot harder to get over then swine flu.
AND they dont make a vacine so you can catch the bug anytime !!! BE CAREFUL !! hahaha  Nice fish by the way !
i'm jealous
Welcome aboard, and nice fish !  Sturgeon is an old favourite of mine too

Aint that the truth!!! That's all i've done this year since the June opener... 15 Skis later, and i still can't get enough!!! not looking forward to the kawartha closer this weekend!  Nice Fish by the way! and awesome first post! welcome to the board!
Looks like the one I caught last thanksgiving. Nice Job Dude!
Bet one of us will get a Musky too, hard to keep them off the line on Scugog during the winter.
